sense.name: mental images during sleep
sense.examples: He told the therapist about his recurring dream of falling from a great height. John usually can't remember his dreams in the morning. Sweet dreams to you.

sense.name: a motivated aspiration, ambition
sense.examples: The athlete fulfilled his dream of competing in the Olympics. Mary and Bob bought their dream home on lakefront property. Although she wasn't the girl of his dreams, she became a very good friend. She devoted her life working for her dream of world peace.

sense.name: fanciful wish
sense.examples: Reality disrupted his comfortable dreams of being a famous rock star. Sitting around with dreams of being rich won't make it happen.

sense.name: absent-minded, distracted, spaced-out
sense.examples: She has been walking around in a dream all day. The child was withdrawn and seemed to be living in a dream.

sense.name: anything perceived as wonderful
sense.examples: This chocolate dessert is a dream! Mary thinks Sally's brother is a dream. John pulled up in a dream of a car.
